Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/e9glnr8-VYM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And a clean, no-text version for those who want it:  

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9LbLGkbhgK8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

All hail Xacktar - and his fine singing voice. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Me likey!

Oh dear... now I have some explaining to do... I watched this awesome video at work... with the sound blasting through the corridor... but I couldn't stop myself, so now my coworkers are glaring at me while I sit here grinning like an Idiot...

absolutely funny video, great work!

> 
> Oh dear... now I have some explaining to do... I watched this awesome video at work... with the sound blasting through the corridor... but I couldn't stop myself, so now my coworkers are glaring at me while I sit here grinning like an Idiot...
> absolutely funny video, great work!

Are they all deaf now? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> All hail Xacktar - and his fine singing voice. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Me likey!

Thanks, KSK!

> 
> @Xacktar
> No, they're not deaf, just... confused. I had to explain what KSP is and who Valentina is and then of course I had do show them the Video again... Now every time I cross anyone in the hallway they look funny at me and smile... still totally worth it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> 
> Btw, maybe a funny side note I should mention: I work for the german aerospace centre (DLR)... which may give a clue to the bafflement of my coworkers

So you're watching videos of me crashing planes while working at a place that specifically tries to avoid such things?

...

...Am I research material now?

Nice one! The song is beautiful.

Those moments destroying huge things with Jeb... now you can do it with Valentina, I like this.
